privacy_characteristics: UK's largest commercial national and regional news publisher
Over 100 regional and national titles
Extensive use of Permutive for on-device audience segmentation
Member of Ozone Project publisher advertising alliance
Uses Lotame DMP for data management and audience insight
Shares data with LiveRamp for identity resolution
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Ipsos Iris audience measurement panel participant
Significant programmatic advertising operation

dmg media.parent: Daily Mail and General Trust plc (DMGT)
privacy_characteristics: MailOnline is one of the world's most visited English-language newspaper websites
Significant programmatic advertising operation
Uses session replay tools for UX analysis
Extensive third-party cookie ecosystem
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Shares data with data brokers including CACI and Experian
Ipsos Iris audience measurement panel participant
DotMetrics digital audience measurement

independent digital news and media.parent: Independent Digital News and Media Ltd
privacy_characteristics: Digital-only national newspaper since 2016
All identified vendors already present in standard ad-tech databases
Standard programmatic advertising operation
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Uses standard consent management platform
Scott Trust ownership — operated for journalistic independence, not shareholder profit
Founding member of Ozone Project publisher advertising alliance
Strong emphasis on reader-funded journalism alongside advertising
Uses Permutive for on-device audience segmentation (privacy-preserving approach)
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Lotame DMP for audience data management with Panorama identity resolution
Relatively contained ad-tech vendor footprint compared to tabloid publishers
Publicly funded broadcaster — distinct privacy obligations under Royal Charter
No programmatic advertising on domestic UK services
BBC Studios (commercial arm) has separate privacy policy for international services
Minimal ad-tech footprint as a public broadcaster
Uses Permutive for audience segmentation in-house
Uses Experian Mosaic geodemographic classification for audience insight
Shares hashed email data with social platforms for audience matching
Custom consent management rather than commercial CMP

news uk.parent: News Corp (via News UK & Ireland Limited)
privacy_characteristics: Part of News Corp global media group
Operates Octave Audio programmatic digital audio advertising platform
NC Audience Exchange (NewsIQ) provides cross-publisher identity tracking globally
NewsIQ cookie syncs across all News Corp properties worldwide (Sun, Times, WSJ, NY Post)
LiveRamp operates as joint controller rather than processor
Covatic SDK used for geolocation-based ad targeting in mobile apps
Ozone Project founding member (publisher advertising alliance)
Extensive vendor ecosystem with dedicated privacy portal (newsprivacy.co.uk)
Shares data with Experian for audience profiling and lookalike modelling
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Ipsos Iris and DotMetrics for audience measurement

financial times.parent: Nikkei Inc. (via The Financial Times Limited)
privacy_characteristics: Premium subscription model reduces reliance on advertising revenue
Notably lean and privacy-conscious ad-tech stack
Uses Google DoubleClick (AdX) for programmatic advertising
Does not name most vendors in privacy policy — refers generically to service providers
39 technology partners listed in consent manager but not individually named in policy
Session replay used for UX research (records scrolling, clicks, text entry)
Owned by Nikkei Inc. — shares subscriber data with parent for joint subscription offers
UK Cyber Essentials accredited
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework via Sourcepoint CMP
Business intelligence data retained for 36 months then aggregated
Founding member of Ozone Project publisher advertising alliance
Premium subscription model alongside advertising
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Uses Permutive for audience segmentation

sky.consent_platform: Custom (Sky iD preferences + cookie settings via Privacy options footer link)
privacy_characteristics: UK's largest pay-TV broadcaster — subsidiary of Comcast Corporation
Shares personal data with Comcast Corporation, NBCUniversal and Peacock TV EMEA Ltd as group companies
Neos Ventures Limited (Sky Protect) shares customer data with Sky even for non-Sky Protect customers to assess insurance eligibility
AdSmart tailored TV advertising — profiles households using personal data, third-party data and viewing habits in groups of 5,000+
AdSmart also operates on Virgin Media platforms — cross-platform targeted advertising
AdVance extends TV ad targeting to digital channels — combines viewing data with online behaviour and third-party data (e.g. from Experian)
Online and digital advertising uses hashed personal data (name, address, DOB, phone, email) for social media and programmatic ad matching
Epsilon and Zeotap named as key digital advertising data matching partners
14 named data broker partners provide address verification, lifestyle profiling, property data, household composition and spending behaviour
Sprinklr used for social listening — monitors social media posts and forums for brand mentions including usernames
Credit reference agencies Experian, Equifax and CRIF used for automated credit decisions and ongoing payment performance sharing
CIFAS, GBG Group PLC and Synectics Solutions Limited for fraud prevention — Synectics acts as joint data controller with Sky
Experian used as data broker intermediary for AdSmart campaign targeting — matches Sky household data against advertiser customer data
Third-party app data sharing with Netflix and Disney+ for cross-platform viewing recommendations and service verification
Sky Mobile shares identity data with third parties for fraud prevention including SIM swap and device theft checks
Domestic & General contacts Sky customers about device insurance and warranty options even without insurance purchase
Loyalty scheme data sharing with Nectar for cross-brand marketing performance reporting
Sky VIP Programme shares personal data with third-party experience and fulfilment partners
Processes data under legitimate interests for profiling, direct marketing, AdSmart, AdVance and online advertising — consent for special category data
Data shared with Comcast companies in USA and India; Sky Protect data processed in India for phone support
Standard Contractual Clauses with ICO data transfer addendum used for international transfers
Customer data retained up to 7 years after account cancellation
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Publicly owned, commercially funded broadcaster
Requires registration for All 4 streaming — collects viewer profiles
Pioneered data-driven advertising in UK broadcasting
Contextual and addressable advertising via 4Sales
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework

jpi media.parent: National World plc (operating as Iconic Media Group Ltd)
privacy_characteristics: Major regional newspaper publisher across UK
Formerly Johnston Press, acquired by National World in 2021
Now operating as Iconic Media Group Ltd
Participates in Ozone Project publisher advertising alliance
214 technology partners listed in Sourcepoint consent manager
LiveRamp operates as joint controller for identity resolution — hashed email shared for cross-device ad targeting
1PlusX AG (now TripleLift) used for cookies and audience data enrichment
118 Data Resource supplies third-party marketing contact lists to publisher
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Significant programmatic advertising operation across regional titles

newsquest.parent: Gannett Co. Inc. (via Newsquest Media Group Ltd)
privacy_characteristics: UK subsidiary of Gannett (US parent company owns USA Today)
Over 200 regional newspaper titles and magazines across UK
Also operates LOCALiQ digital marketing, s1 Jobs, and Exchange & Mart
LiveRamp operates as joint controller — hashed email shared for cross-device ad targeting
Third-party ad networks include Google AdEx, Magnite (Rubicon), and Criteo for behavioural retargeting
Experian used for credit reference and consumer data enrichment
ZoomInfo Technologies used as data broker to validate business contact details
Arkadium games platform with InMobi/Quantcast for ad serving and consent
HubSpot used for digital marketing automation
2AdPro in India receives personal data for ad production under EU model contracts
Audience extension enables advertisers to target Newsquest readers on other websites
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Marketing contact lists reviewed and deleted after three years of inactivity
Publicly owned UK public service broadcaster (Channel Four Television Corporation)
Requires mandatory account registration to access content — collects name, email, date of birth, gender, postcode
Extensive use of Acxiom for data pairing — enriches user profiles with electoral roll and demographic data
InfoSum used for privacy-preserving data matching via secure data bunkers
Mediarithmics operates as core data management platform and warehouse for audience segmentation
FreeWheel (Comcast) handles ad delivery and frequency capping
Retail data partnerships with Nectar360, Boots, and Tesco — shopping behaviour matched to viewer profiles
Dynata research panels (Core4, Your4) for audience measurement and profiling
YouView connected TV platform enables device-level targeted advertising via BT postcode data
Broadcaster data sharing — shares viewer profiles with other broadcasters for cross-platform ad targeting
Google reCAPTCHA deployed for bot detection with data transferred to USA
Innovid handles personalised advertising with data stored in USA under standard contractual clauses
Moat (Oracle) used for ad verification with USA data transfer
Social media CAPI integration for measuring advertising effectiveness on third-party platforms
Channel 4+ subscription service uses MPP Global and Global Payments for payment processing
Two-year account inactivity triggers deletion with prior email warnings
Processes most data under legitimate interests legal basis rather than consent

itv plc.consent_platform: Custom (Data Permissions settings in ITVX account)
privacy_characteristics: UK's largest commercial broadcaster — holds 13 of 15 ITV network licences
ITVX streaming service requires account registration — collects name, email, phone, date of birth, postcode
Planet V (The Addressable Platform Limited) is ITV's own addressable advertising platform within the ITV group
Distribution partner arrangements with Sky, BT, YouView and Virgin Media for targeted ad insertion on set-top boxes
Meta (Facebook Ireland Limited) joint controller arrangement for pixel-based tracking on ITVX
TikTok pixel integration for marketing promotion measurement
AppsFlyer used for mobile marketing campaign measurement and attribution — links device Advertising ID
Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager for web analytics and cookie management
Adalyser used as third-party Share of Voice measurement service on ITV Media
STV Player data sharing — ITV receives STV registration and viewing data for advertising purposes as separate controller
Interactive ads allow users to consent to sharing name and email directly with advertisers
Hashed identifiers shared with social media platforms for audience matching and exclusion
Kindred Soul Limited operates ITV Kerching browser extension as separate controller
Arkadium games platform (itv.arkadium.com) operates under separate privacy terms
Apple iOS14+ App Tracking Transparency affects device Advertising ID usage
USA data transfers for Google, Meta and TikTok under standard contractual clauses
Data Permissions settings give users control over targeted advertising and data collection
Processes most data under legitimate interests legal basis — consent only for email marketing

paramount.parent: Paramount Skydance Corporation (formerly Paramount Global / ViacomCBS)
privacy_characteristics: US-headquartered global media conglomerate applying a single worldwide privacy policy across all properties
UK controller is Channel 5 Broadcasting Limited at 17-29 Hawley Crescent, London NW1 8TT
Merged with Skydance Media in August 2025 to form Paramount Skydance Corporation
Privacy policy is intentionally generic — names very few specific third-party vendors unlike UK-specific broadcaster policies
Google Analytics and Adobe Omniture named as analytics providers with opt-out links
Nielsen proprietary measurement software used for TV Ratings across Paramount properties
Meta, Snap and X identified as social advertising partners for custom audience matching
References 'data licensors and aggregators' as a partner category without naming specific companies
Shares hashed user information with social media platforms for targeted advertising
Interest-based advertising with opt-out via Google Ad Settings and other industry tools
Supports Global Privacy Control (GPC) browser signal for opt-out of data sharing
Cookie policy embedded within main privacy policy — no separate UK-specific cookie disclosure
Channel 5 / My5 privacy pages redirect to Paramount's global policy rather than providing UK-specific details
EyeQ connected video advertising platform for cross-screen ad targeting across Paramount properties
Pluto TV (free ad-supported streaming) operated via Paramount-owned entity in Berlin for European market
Collects registration data, viewing history, device information and advertising identifiers across streaming services
Uses cookies, pixel tags, SDKs and similar technologies for cross-platform tracking and measurement
German-owned media group — UK's largest commercial radio operator and major magazine publisher
Four UK entities: Bauer Consumer Media Ltd, Bauer Radio Ltd, H Bauer Publishing, H Bauer Publishing Limited and HBVB
Registered office at Media House, Peterborough Business Park, Lynch Wood, Peterborough PE2 6EA
LiveRamp joint controller arrangement — shares hashed email, IP address and mobile advertising IDs for cross-device identity resolution
Utiq telecom-based identity technology — joint controller arrangement using ISP connection-level marketing identifiers
Facebook SDK integrated into apps for launch tracking, action tracking and advertising campaign attribution
Google Firebase SDK for analytics, push notifications, cohort audiences and feature toggling in apps
Adjust attribution SDK tracks which ad campaign, email or social post drove app installs
Braze and Airship used for push notifications, in-app messaging and user engagement across apps
OneSignal delivers browser-based push notifications on websites
AppTweak used for anonymous statistical information about app usage
Ipsos Iris market research with UKOM and DotMetrics for UK online audience measurement
ABC (Audit Bureau of Circulations) receives personal data for aggregated circulation and usage verification
Facebook Custom Audiences — hashed email addresses shared via SHA-256 for lookalike and retargeted advertising
Audience Extension retargeting on Facebook, LinkedIn, Google, TikTok, Pinterest and Twitter
Real-time bidding (RTB) advertising auctions on website ad inventory with multiple advertising partners
Data matching with advertising clients to identify overlapping audiences at aggregate level
Sourcepoint consent management platform implementing IAB TCF v2 framework across apps and websites
Contentpass offered as alternative advertising-and-tracking-free access subscription
Collects device ID, IP address, browser information, clickstream data and ad interaction data
Online Behavioural Advertising based on browsing patterns, page views and ad interactions across Bauer titles
